article_title: Police: Pedestrian hit, suffers serious injuries
article_text:
Tucson Police say a woman was hit walking near Grant and Alvernon. According to Sgt. Pete Dugan, she suffered serious injuries.

Northbound Alvernon near Grant was shut down as police investigated.

Police say the woman was not in a crosswalk.

Copyright 2015 Tucson News Now. All rights reserved.
